name: Untitled Robot Game - Godot Wild Jam 35
name_original: Untitled Robot Game - Godot Wild Jam 35
description:
Looking for Lost technologies around the world. 

As a scavenger robot, your job is to find ancient weapons. Unfortunately, you are not the only one trying to find these relics which can unleash destruction.

Get rid of your enemies and try shooting with the power of the elders!

Game Instructions

Untitled Robot Game is a shooter with mouse and keyboard. Use the mouse to aim and shoot, and use the keyboard to control the character and use your skills.

(Controls can be remapped)

  • wasd to move
  • Space to activate your first skill
  •  Shift to activate your second skill

You start with defensive skills. These can be switched for better weapons at the expense of your survivability (Trade-off wildcard).
